iati-activity.title: Automation of voter identification process in 2015-17
iati-activity.description: It is aimed at capacity building of the State Registry Service and the Central Election Commission to implementation of the electoral rights of citizens and guarantee peaceful, free and fair elections.

iati-activity.description: The main goal of the project is to equip the SRS and the CEC with modern IT instruments and offer some capacity development in order to ensure implementation of the electoral rights of citizens and guarantee peaceful, free and fair elections.
